name: ralndv1

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, cv(s0), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, cv(s0), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))
-| wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, cv(s0), wcel(universe, cv(s0)))
-| wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))

comment: Example for a theorem about a restricted universal quantification in which the restricting class depends on (actually is) the bound variable: All sets containing themselves contain the universal class. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.)
